title: Old Spice End Frame Sans
content:
What are the two typefaces used in this end frame please

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016230418/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_362.png) | 112.59 KB |
author: vonslam

comments.content: That "for" should be Spoleto/OptiSport/Aktuelle, which turns up a lot (see e.g. here: [http://typophile.com/node/68871](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016230418/http:/typophile.com/node/68871 "http://typophile.com/node/68871")). I'm not sure where it's available though.

W+K Portland use this font on there Blog.

[http://blog.wk.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016230418/http:/blog.wk.com/ "http://blog.wk.com/")

From the SLFR text (flash text) it's called "Channel Bold"

[http://blog.wk.com/sifr/channel-bold.swf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016230418/http:/blog.wk.com/sifr/channel-bold.swf "http://blog.wk.com/sifr/channel-bold.swf")
